name: Hangfeng He 0001
content: Home | Hangfeng He I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and the Goergen Institute for Data Science and Artificial Intelligence at the University of Rochester. I obtained my Ph.D. from the University of Pennsylvania, where I worked with Dan Roth and Weijie Su. I received my bachelor’s degree from Peking University. My research interests include natural language processing and machine learning, with a focus on interpreting deep learning models, leveraging indirect signals, and advancing reasoning in large language models. [Google Scholar] [CV] Contact Office: 3009 Wegmans Hall, 250 Hutchison Rd, Rochester, NY 14620 Email: hangfeng.he@rochester.edu
